snippet: Tom Brady's lawyers asked a federal appeals court for a new hearing before an expanded panel of judges, telling them on Monday that it is not just a silly dispute over underinflated footballs — it's the basic right to a fair process that is ...
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady's lawyers asked a federal appeals court for a new hearing before an expanded panel of judges, telling them on Monday that it is not just a silly dispute over underinflated footballs — it's the basic right to a fair process that is shared by all union workers.

headline.main: Still Plenty of Air in 'Deflategate' Court Case
headline.print_headline: Still Plenty of Air in 'Deflategate' Court Case
